docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is stable and recommended for use. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or using api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: update
methods.full_description: Adds role ‘Anonymous’ to the user if it is not already present. Only another admin can change the admin account attribute.
examples:
PUT /api/users/980190969
{
  "user": {
    "login": "johnsmith",
    "mail": "john@example.com",
    "auth_source_id": "200482051",
    "password": "123456"
  }
}
200
{
  "admin": null,
  "auth_source_id": 200482051,
  "avatar_hash": null,
  "compute_resources_andor": "or",
  "created_at": "2014-08-07T20:41:56Z",
  "default_location_id": null,
  "default_organization_id": null,
  "domains_andor": "or",
  "facts_andor": "or",
  "filter_on_owner": null,
  "firstname": null,
  "hostgroups_andor": "or",
  "id": 980190969,
  "last_login_on": null,
  "lastname": null,
  "locale": null,
  "locations_andor": "or",
  "login": "johnsmith",
  "mail": "john@example.com",
  "organizations_andor": "or",
  "password_hash": "294a22d8b73051a9e6df71d8820558cdfe70a68c",
  "password_salt": "d3963cabbd9d6e34ad49affae86ceda7b749d20e",
  "subscribe_to_all_hostgroups": null,

}
